--- In nihontostudy@yahoogroups.com, "Michael Vinehout" 
<mljvine@h...> wrote:
> Hi Alex and welcome,
> My advice would be to come to a sword show.  Next month in San 
Fran, Sept

Rich's web 
> site on reputable dealer links to thier websites.
> Mike

> >Hello all!
> >I am new to collecting, but have been interested ever since I was
> >little. I have picked up several books (and yes, read them) and 
came
> >to the realization that the only way to start expanding my
> >understanding from this point is to start making some purchases. 
The
> >question I pose to all here is this:
> >Is there any one thing that a new collector should look for above 
all
> >else when making a buy?
> >Now, I know this is a very generalized question, but I need to 
start
> >somewhere.
> >
> >Thanks all!
> >
> >Alex Bivin

> >BTW - Would like to thank Mr. Stein for his excellent website! It 
was
